2024 年 4 月 28 日星期日 10:06:28 +0000 TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在世界各地的 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在世界各地的 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
商业成功的秘诀|皮特·斯塔夫罗斯皮特·斯塔夫罗斯Too often, employees are unmotivated and unhappy, with no real incentive to invest much of anything into their place of work. Investment expert Pete Stavros thinks there's a better way, and he's on a mission to rethink corporate structures to expand who benefits from a thriving company. Sharing personal stories of his own journey along with the profound impact doing this work effectively can have, this moving talk provides a blueprint for changing the narrative — and outlook — for millions of workers worldwide.商业成功的秘诀|皮特·斯塔夫罗斯Too often, employees are unmotivated and unhappy, with no real incentive to invest much of anything into their place of work. Investment expert Pete Stavros thinks there's a better way, and he's on a mission to rethink corporate structures to expand who benefits from a thriving company. Sharing personal stories of his own journey along with the profound impact doing this work effectively can have, this moving talk provides a blueprint for changing the narrative — and outlook — for millions of workers worldwide. https://www.ted.com/talks/pete_stavros_the_secret_ingredient_of_business_success?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129391 129391 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 14:47:50 +0000高等教育不00:13:03泰德
如何与火共存？欧乐麦奎尔欧乐麦奎尔Uncontrolled fire threatens nature — but the right kind of fire can maintain the health and balance of the land, says fire management expert Oral McGuire. As a leader in the Nyungar community of southwestern Australia and a former firefighter, he connects traditional wisdom with modern techniques to wield fire in a way that promotes biodiversity and heals the spirit of the land at the same time.如何与火共存？欧乐麦奎尔Uncontrolled fire threatens nature — but the right kind of fire can maintain the health and balance of the land, says fire management expert Oral McGuire. As a leader in the Nyungar community of southwestern Australia and a former firefighter, he connects traditional wisdom with modern techniques to wield fire in a way that promotes biodiversity and heals the spirit of the land at the same time. https://www.ted.com/talks/oral_mcguire_how_to_live_with_fire?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:128624 128624 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 15:01:29 +0000高等教育不00:11:02泰德
Niceaunties 怪异而美妙的艺术 |尼斯阿姨们尼斯阿姨们Welcome to the "Auntieverse" — a surreal tribute to "auntie culture" by artist Niceaunties, inspired by the spirit of the women who care for each other and their families. From sushi-bedecked cars with legs to hot tub baths full of ramen, Niceaunties shares a visual feast that fuses AI and imagination and celebrates the eccentric, vibrant world of aunties with reverence and awe. (Slides created with AI including Midjourney and DALL·E 3 for text-to-image creation; magnific.ai and Topaz Labs for upscaling the images; Pikalabs and Runwayml for animation.) 有说服力的讲故事的艺术 |凯利·D·帕克凯利·D·帕克"Storytelling is one of the most powerful marketing and leadership tools there is," says communications expert Kelly D. Parker. She explains how stories make proposals of all kinds more memorable — and shows how you can craft a compelling narrative to connect, persuade and drive meaningful action.有说服力的讲故事的艺术 |凯利·D·帕克"Storytelling is one of the most powerful marketing and leadership tools there is," says communications expert Kelly D. Parker. 气候解决方案？代代相传的智慧 |路易丝·马布罗路易丝·马布罗Louise Mabulo grew up on seemingly strange farming tips from her parents and grandparents — like planting crops during a full moon or burying a rock beneath them. Now a farmer and climate activist herself, she sees how these practical nuggets of wisdom actually have scientific merit. Learn how she's merging traditional knowledge with modern science to help farmers (and the world) adapt to a changing climate.气候解决方案？代代相传的智慧 |路易丝·马布罗Louise Mabulo grew up on seemingly strange farming tips from her parents and grandparents — like planting crops during a full moon or burying a rock beneath them. Now a farmer and climate activist herself, she sees how these practical nuggets of wisdom actually have scientific merit. Learn how she's merging traditional knowledge with modern science to help farmers (and the world) adapt to a changing climate. https://www.ted.com/talks/louise_mabulo_a_climate_solution_the_wisdom_passed_down_through_ Generations?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127861 127861 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 15:08:21 +0000高等教育不00:06:52泰德
到底什么是人工智能？ |穆斯塔法·苏莱曼穆斯塔法·苏莱曼When it comes to artificial intelligence, what are we actually creating? Even those closest to its development are struggling to describe exactly where things are headed, says Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman, one of the primary architects of the AI models many of us use today. He offers an honest and compelling new vision for the future of AI, proposing an unignorable metaphor — a new digital species — to focus attention on this extraordinary moment. (Followed by a Q&A with head of TED Chris Anderson)到底什么是人工智能？ |穆斯塔法·苏莱曼When it comes to artificial intelligence, what are we actually creating? Even those closest to its development are struggling to describe exactly where things are headed, says Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman, one of the primary architects of the AI models many of us use today. He offers an honest and compelling new vision for the future of AI, proposing an unignorable metaphor — a new digital species — to focus attention on this extraordinary moment. (Followed by a Q&A with head of TED Chris Anderson) https://www.ted.com/talks/mustafa_suleyman_what_is_an_ai_anyway?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129248 129248 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 14:58:04 +0000高等教育不00:21:57泰德
AI将如何走出屏幕进入现实世界 |丹妮拉·罗斯丹妮拉·罗斯The convergence of AI and robotics will unlock a wonderful new world of possibilities in everyday life, says robotics and AI pioneer Daniela Rus. Diving into the way machines think, she reveals how "liquid networks" — a revolutionary class of AI that mimics the neural processes of simple organisms — could help intelligent machines process information more efficiently and give rise to "physical intelligence" that will enable AI to operate beyond digital confines and engage dynamically in the real world. AI将如何走出屏幕进入现实世界 |丹妮拉·罗斯The convergence of AI and robotics will unlock a wonderful new world of possibilities in everyday life, says robotics and AI pioneer Daniela Rus. Diving into the way machines think, she reveals how "liquid networks" — a revolutionary class of AI that mimics the neural processes of simple organisms — could help intelligent machines process information more efficiently and give rise to "physical intelligence" that will enable AI to operate beyond digital confines and engage dynamically in the real world. https://www.ted.com/talks/daniela_rus_how_ai_will_step_off_the_screen_and_into_the_real_world?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129088 129088 Fri, 19 Apr 2024 14:48:18 +0000高等教育不00:12:51泰德
如何成为一名积极的公民并引发变革|加布里埃尔·马尔门蒂尼加布里埃尔·马尔门蒂尼What does it mean to be an active citizen? It's about more than just voting and paying taxes, says social entrepreneur Gabriel Marmentini. He explains why we can't rely on the state alone to solve all our problems — and presents the four key ingredients for anyone to become a change-maker and engage in solving public issues.如何成为一名积极的公民并引发变革|加布里埃尔·马尔门蒂尼What does it mean to be an active citizen? 巴勒斯坦人和以色列人面对面|阿齐兹·阿布·萨拉和毛兹·伊农阿齐兹·阿布·萨拉和毛兹·伊农How can Israelis and Palestinians achieve peace? Palestinian peacemaker Aziz Abu Sarah and Israeli peacemaker Maoz Inon discuss the immeasurable tragedies they've experienced growing up in the region — and how they choose reconciliation over revenge, again and again. With a fierce belief in a better future, they talk about conflict, safety, finding shared values and how they're building a coalition of Israeli and Palestinian citizens who are intent on creating a path to hope and peace.巴勒斯坦人和以色列人面对面|阿齐兹·阿布·萨拉和毛兹·伊农How can Israelis and Palestinians achieve peace? 您可以采取哪些措施来制止经济犯罪|半城塞伯特半城塞伯特It might sound like the plot of a movie, but economic crime is all around us — from drug trafficking and fraud to cybercrimes, tax evasion and more. Economic crime fighter Hanjo Seibert breaks down the complexities of money laundering and how we can all wield our collective power to dismantle the underworld economy and turn off the money tap for criminals.您可以采取哪些措施来制止经济犯罪|半城塞伯特It might sound like the plot of a movie, but economic crime is all around us — from drug trafficking and fraud to cybercrimes, tax evasion and more. 为什么你要让父母失望？德西丽·阿卡万德西丽·阿卡万When filmmaker Desiree Akhavan told her Iranian immigrant parents she was in love with a woman, she knew they would object.
